---
title: "Density Plots"
output: html_document
---

Collect metrics for a list of Github repos stored in a CSV file.


```{r}
require("alm")
packages <- read.csv("github_repos.csv", encoding = "UTF8", sep = ",", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
canonical_urls <- packages$url

alm <- alm_ids(canonical_url = canonical_urls, total_details = TRUE)
alm <- ldply(alm$data)
```

Density plot for Europe PMC citations.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot_density(alm)
```
